plugin.name: IntelEngine
plugin.description:
AI-powered NPC autonomy mod for Skyrim. Gives NPCs the ability to travel, perform tasks, and create dynamic story events powered by SkyrimNet's LLM integration.
Features: - Player-directed NPC tasks (GoToLocation, FetchPerson, DeliverMessage, SearchForActor, ScheduleMeeting, EscortTarget) - LLM Dungeon Master story events (seek_player, informant, road_encounter, ambush, stalker, message, quest) - Autonomous NPC social interactions (npc_interaction, npc_gossip) - All features configurable via MCM
Requirements: SKSE, SkyrimNet, PapyrusExtender (po3), PapyrusUtil, MCM Helper
